name: Nepali Date and Time
description: Nepali Time application displays current Nepali date and time. Moreover, it displays current date and time of whole over the world. It becomes easy to compare Nepali time with other time zones. The user is able to see Nepali time with desired time of city or country.    The key features of this application are:  1. Displays current Nepali Time and Date. 2. Displays current date and time of world. 3. User can easily search the Place, City or Country and find out the world time. 4. User can compare Nepali time with other time zones. 5. Auto time changing features benefits users to see updated time without reloading the application. 6. BS to AD and AD to BS Nepali Date converter. 7. Nepali Latest News 8. Clock Widgets 9.
